<Link id="l00641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="641"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxProm = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-instrprofiling-cpp-/#a8e743c99eceeaeee15f380f474b5783e">MaxNumOfPromotionsPerLoop</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="642"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;TargetBlock : LoopExitBlocks) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="643"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;TargetLoop = LI.getLoopFor(TargetBlock);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="644"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!TargetLoop)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="645"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="646"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxPromForTarget = getMaxNumOfPromotionsInLoop(TargetLoop);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="647"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PendingCandsInTarget = LoopToCandidates&#91;TargetLoop&#93;.size();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="648"><span class="doxyHighlight">      MaxProm =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="649"><span class="doxyHighlight">          std::min(MaxProm, std::max(MaxPromForTarget, PendingCandsInTarget) -</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="650"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                PendingCandsInTarget);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="651"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="652"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxProm;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="653"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="654"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="655"><span class="doxyHighlight">  DenseMap&lt;Loop &#42;, SmallVector&lt;LoadStorePair, 8&gt;&gt; &amp;LoopToCandidates;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="656"><span class="doxyHighlight">  SmallVector&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, 8&gt; ExitBlocks;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="657"><span class="doxyHighlight">  SmallVector&lt;Instruction &#42;, 8&gt; InsertPts;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="658"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Loop &amp;L;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="659"><span class="doxyHighlight">  LoopInfo &amp;LI;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="660"><span class="doxyHighlight">  BlockFrequencyInfo &#42;BFI;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="661"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="664"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Individual values are tracked. Currently used for indiret call target</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="665"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// profiling.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="682"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Lowerer.lower())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="683"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/preservedanalyses/#a1258a1ff55557c27684010ebd7283712">PreservedAnalyses::all</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="686"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="687"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="688"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="689"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Perform instrumentation sampling.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="690"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="691"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There are 3 favors of sampling:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="692"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (1) Full burst sampling: We transform:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="693"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Increment&#95;Instruction;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="694"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="695"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   if (&#95;&#95;llvm&#95;profile&#95;sampling&#95;&#95; &lt;= SampledInstrBurstDuration - 1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="696"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     Increment&#95;Instruction;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="697"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="698"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   &#95;&#95;llvm&#95;profile&#95;sampling&#95;&#95; += 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="699"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   if (&#95;&#95;llvm&#95;profile&#95;sampling&#95;&#95; &gt;= SampledInstrPeriod) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="700"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     &#95;&#95;llvm&#95;profile&#95;sampling&#95;&#95; = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="701"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="702"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="703"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &quot;&#95;&#95;llvm&#95;profile&#95;sampling&#95;&#95;&quot; is a thread-local global shared by all PGO</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="704"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// counters (value-instrumentation and edge instrumentation).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="705"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="706"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (2) Fast burst sampling:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="707"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &quot;&#95;&#95;llvm&#95;profile&#95;sampling&#95;&#95;&quot; variable is an unsigned type, meaning it will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="708"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// wrap around to zero when overflows. In this case, the second check is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="709"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// unnecessary, so we won&#39;t generate check2 when the SampledInstrPeriod is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="710"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// set to 65536 (64K). The code after:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="711"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   if (&#95;&#95;llvm&#95;profile&#95;sampling&#95;&#95; &lt;= SampledInstrBurstDuration - 1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="712"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     Increment&#95;Instruction;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="713"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="714"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   &#95;&#95;llvm&#95;profile&#95;sampling&#95;&#95; += 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="715"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="716"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (3) Simple sampling:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="717"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// When SampledInstrBurstDuration is set to 1, we do a simple sampling:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="718"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   &#95;&#95;llvm&#95;profile&#95;sampling&#95;&#95; += 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="719"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   if (&#95;&#95;llvm&#95;profile&#95;sampling&#95;&#95; &gt;= SampledInstrPeriod) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="720"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     &#95;&#95;llvm&#95;profile&#95;sampling&#95;&#95; = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="721"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     Increment&#95;Instruction;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="722"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="723"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="724"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note that, the code snippet after the transformation can still be counter</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="725"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// promoted. However, with sampling enabled, counter updates are expected to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="726"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// be infrequent, making the benefits of counter promotion negligible.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="727"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Moreover, counter promotion can potentially cause issues in server</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="728"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// applications, particularly when the counters are dumped without a clean</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="729"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// exit. To mitigate this risk, counter promotion is disabled by default when</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="730"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sampling is enabled. This behavior can be overridden using the internal</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="731"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// option.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="732"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InstrLowerer::doSampling(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="733"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!isSamplingEnabled())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="734"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="735"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="736"><span class="doxyHighlight">  SampledInstrumentationConfig config = getSampledInstrumentationConfig();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="737"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> GetConstant = &#91;&amp;config&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> &amp;Builder, uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="738"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (config.UseShort)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="739"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#ac33b7f085ea15691aa45a61ef207d603">getInt16</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="740"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="741"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a8246a9e9405ffe2a9d8d020a949c8e96">getInt32</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="742"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="743"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="744"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/integertype">IntegerType</a> &#42;SamplingVarTy;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="745"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (config.UseShort)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="746"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SamplingVarTy = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a87f56db834c58ca630624956ecf6972f">Type::getInt16Ty</a>(M.getContext());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="747"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="748"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SamplingVarTy = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a30dd396c5b40cd86c1591872e574ccdf">Type::getInt32Ty</a>(M.getContext());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="749"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;SamplingVar =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="750"><span class="doxyHighlight">      M.getGlobalVariable(<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/profiledata/instrprof-h/#a07e221f576fdc8eeff45d6c1bd688e9e">INSTR&#95;PROF&#95;QUOTE</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/profiledata/instrprof-h/#ade433207aef82efb42a028ff4125614a">INSTR&#95;PROF&#95;PROFILE&#95;SAMPLING&#95;VAR</a>));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="751"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(SamplingVar &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;SamplingVar not set properly&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="752"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="753"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Create the condition for checking the burst duration.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="754"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;SamplingVarIncr;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="755"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;NewSamplingVarVal;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="756"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdbuilder">MDBuilder</a> MDB(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;getContext());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="757"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode">MDNode</a> &#42;BranchWeight;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="758"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> CondBuilder(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="759"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;LoadSamplingVar = CondBuilder.CreateLoad(SamplingVarTy, SamplingVar);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="760"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (config.IsSimpleSampling) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="761"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For the simple sampling, just create the load and increments.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="762"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> IncBuilder(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="763"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NewSamplingVarVal =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="764"><span class="doxyHighlight">        IncBuilder.CreateAdd(LoadSamplingVar, GetConstant(IncBuilder, 1));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="765"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SamplingVarIncr = IncBuilder.CreateStore(NewSamplingVarVal, SamplingVar);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="766"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00767" /><CodeLine lineNumber="767"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For the burst-sampling, create the conditional update.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00768" /><CodeLine lineNumber="768"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;DurationCond = CondBuilder.CreateICmpULE(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="769"><span class="doxyHighlight">        LoadSamplingVar, GetConstant(CondBuilder, config.BurstDuration - 1));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="770"><span class="doxyHighlight">    BranchWeight = MDB.createBranchWeights(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00771" /><CodeLine lineNumber="771"><span class="doxyHighlight">        config.BurstDuration, config.Period - config.BurstDuration);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1258"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Calculate bit offset into bitmap byte by using div8 remainder (AND ~8)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1366"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1368"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// unfavorable interaction between the new alias and the alias renaming done</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1755"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1756"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Due to the limitation of binder as of 2021/09/28, the duplicate weak</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1757"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// symbols in the same csect won&#39;t be discarded. When there are duplicate weak</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1758"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// symbols, we can NOT guarantee that the relocations get resolved to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1759"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// intended weak symbol, so we can not ensure the correctness of the relative</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1910"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Heuristic for small programs with very few total value sites.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1911"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The default value of vp-counters-per-site is chosen based on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1912"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the observation that large apps usually have a low percentage</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1913"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of value sites that actually have any profile data, and thus</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1914"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the average number of counters per site is low. For small</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1915"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// apps with very few sites, this may not be true. Bump up the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1916"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// number of counters in this case.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1917"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#define INSTR&#95;PROF&#95;MIN&#95;VAL&#95;COUNTS 10</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01918" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1918"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a435d7554367e426f8c41efd8c1f70ab0">NumCounters</a> &lt; <a href="#a93e915bb608cd018593a10deb3bf386b">INSTR&#95;PROF&#95;MIN&#95;VAL&#95;COUNTS</a>)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2100"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InstrLowerer::emitUses() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2101"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The metadata sections are parallel arrays. Optimizers (e.g.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2102"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// GlobalOpt/ConstantMerge) may not discard associated sections as a unit, so</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2103"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we conservatively retain all unconditionally in the compiler.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2104"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2105"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// On ELF and Mach-O, the linker can guarantee the associated sections will be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2106"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// retained or discarded as a unit, so llvm.compiler.used is sufficient.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2107"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Similarly on COFF, if prof data is not referenced by code we use one comdat</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2108"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and ensure this GC property as well. Otherwise, we have to conservatively</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2109"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// make all of the sections retained by the linker.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2110"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/#a5667e0461a51d2c4887056c3f684c341adf1f3edb9115acb0a1e04209b7a9937b">TT</a>.isOSBinFormatELF() || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/#a5667e0461a51d2c4887056c3f684c341adf1f3edb9115acb0a1e04209b7a9937b">TT</a>.isOSBinFormatMachO() ||</span></CodeLine>
